condition-desc: Specify when a bot should respond to a message.
actions-desc: Specify what the bot should do when it detects such a message.
exceptions-desc: Specify where and what roles you want to use this plugin.
set-negative-money: To remove money from a user set this to a negative value (e.g. -100).
set-negative-xp: To remove XP from a user set this to a negative value (e.g. -100).
responder-desc: The bot will respond to user messages
automodwarning-channels: Note: Currently, this plugin won't do anything! No channels have been allowed. Add a channel in the box above or click on the "Banned" button.
automodwarning-roles: Note: Currently, this plugin won't do anything! No roles have been allowed. Add a role in the box above or click on the "Banned" button.
send-message-cooldown: Send a message when user typed a query too fast.
